PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-05122000-04-050TB,  TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into an AGREEMENT with the Province of QUEBEC which provides for the transfer to the Province of the administration and control of the land and facilities associated with ten ferry terminals situated at the following locations: Baie-Comeau, Île-aux-Coudres, Matane, Montmagny, Rivière-du-Loup, Saint-Antoine-de-l'Isle-aux-Grues, St-Ignace-de-Loyola, Saint-Joseph-de-la-Rive, Saint-Siméon and Sorel.
Attachments
